root.name: Fox Hunt
root.description: Gameplay There are three modes of play in FOX HUNT, each dedicated to specific situations Jack finds himself in.Exploration ModeIn Exploration Mode, the game controls Jack much like a point-and-click adventure. Click the lady, put on the charm.Fight ModeIf the lady Jack charms isn't in the mood, he may find himself needing to throw a few punches. With Fight Mode enabled, you can clumsily defend yourself while lathered in full FMV goodness.Maze Mode To get around the city, you drive in Maze Mode. CastJack Fremont - Andrew BowenThe Fox - Don MorrowAlan - Jeff RectorAllen - Jerry Rector (twin of Jeff Rector)Frank - Timmothy BottomsChauncey - George LazenbyEdison Pettibone - Rob LoweThe Wolf - Lewis Arquette
